text: ane avi ja rite ame dareka payagambara na satru'o, ghana setanonum sarjana karyu che, ketalaka manavi'o manthi ane ketalaka jinnato manthi, jemanthi ketalaka loko ketalakane mithi-mithi vatomam bhatakave che, jethi te'one dhokamam nankhi de ane jo allaha ta'ala icchato to a loko ava karyo na karata, to te lokone ane je kami pana juthanum theravi rahya che, tene tame chodi do
